europeana:record.dc:title: Systematic notes on Asian birds. 10. The “Nouveau recueil de planches coloriées” of Temminck & Laugier (1820-1839): the little known impression of 1850
Zoologische Verhandelingen
europeana:record.dc:creator: Sayako N.
Dickinson E.C.
europeana:record.dc:subject: Aves
Temminck
Nouveau recueil de planches coloriées
Baillière
edition
wrappers
europeana:record.dc:description: A copy of the reported 1850 impression of the “Nouveau recueil de planches coloriées” that has recently come to light suggests that bound copies would be virtually indistinguishable from the first edition (1820-1839) despite the different publisher. In spite of clear statements by the publisher, we believe there must be doubts whether any part of such an edition, other than the wrappers, was specially reprinted. The wrappers found with this copy confirm that during the appearance of the first edition generic wrappers were created, which did not have details of the contents on the back.
europeana:record.dcterms:isPartOf: Systematic notes on Asian birds. 10. The “Nouveau recueil de planches coloriées” of Temminck & Laugier (1820-1839): the little known impression of 1850 (Volume 335)
